__e: I made a terrible mistake, my love... but I swear to you... that I'm gonna fix it.
Listen, we just really need to talk.
You've got... you have got to put this thing behind you, this horrible mistake that everybody knows about.
I'll help you say goodbye and leave this place horribly forever!
They sent me to that scary place...
Seems your mother had a reason to bring you to this dreadful place after all.
He doesn't work here because he had a horrible accident in our warehouse.
Every woman who works for us looks like they've been in some kind of horrible accident.
I just don't understand why you had to keep it a secret.
-But when I loved you most... was when I had to say all those awful things to you yesterday.
You have already done so much. Not believing all the terrible things they say about me committing all those awful crimes.
